com.ontolabs.ayllu.data

Interface DataSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Collection<DataVector>, java.lang.Iterable<DataVector>, java.util.List<DataVector>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WekaDataSet

    public interface DataSet
extends java.util.List<DataVector>
    The Interface DataSet is the abstraction of Collection of @see DataVector. This is used in all the algorithms as sample for training, pruning sets, testing etc. It hides the implementation of vendor specific collection.
